game.name: SOK MIN
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SOK MIN is the smallest and the easiest levels of SOK puzzle. Now you may not need a guide to complete each level. Just try it!
game.shortDescriptionEn: SOK MIN is the smallest and the easiest levels of SOK puzzle. Now you may not need a guide to complete each level. Just try it!
